ThingDef.label: Springfield 1903 （bayonet）
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern bolt-action rifle.This gun is equipped with a bayonet.

ThingDef.label: Winchester 1907 （bayonet）
ThingDef.description: An ancient semi-automatic rifle equipped with a bayonet.

ThingDef.label: RSC M1917 （bayonet）
ThingDef.description: An ancient semi-automatic rifle equipped with a bayonet.

ThingDef.label: Auto5（bayonet）
ThingDef.description: A reliable semi-automatic shotgun equipped with a bayonet.

ThingDef.label: Springfield 1903 Pederson
ThingDef.description: An ancient pattern bolt-action rifle.This gun can be converted to semi-automatic carbine for use.

ThingDef.label: Winchester 1907
ThingDef.description: An ancient semi-automatic rifle.

ThingDef.label: FaquarHill
ThingDef.description: An ancient semi-automatic rifle.

ThingDef.label: Maxim Semi
ThingDef.description: An ancient Maxim semi-automatic rifle.

ThingDef.label: Auto5
ThingDef.description: A reliable semi-automatic shotgun.

ThingDef.label: Winchester “Iron Broom”
ThingDef.description: Transformed into a fully automatic Winchester rifle,Equipped with a large bullet drum

ThingDef.label: Winchester “Sight”
ThingDef.description: Transformed into a fully automatic Winchester rifle，equip with a sight.

ThingDef.label: Winchester “auto”
ThingDef.description: Transformed into a fully automatic Winchester rifle，Full auto.

ThingDef.label: RSC smg
ThingDef.description: A submachine gun modified from a semi-automatic rifle, considered the ancestor of modern PDW.

ThingDef.label: RSC smg （Extended）
ThingDef.description: A submachine gun modified from a semi-automatic rifle, considered the ancestor of modern PDW.Extended magazine with 20 rounds.

ThingDef.label: Perosa smg
ThingDef.description: The first experimental submachine gun, made up of two high-speed submachine guns, is extremely lethal at close range.

ThingDef.label: MG15 na
ThingDef.description: A lightweight aircraft machine gun that can also be used by infantry.

ThingDef.label: experimental automatic rifle
ThingDef.description: Experimental bullpup automatic rifle with light machine gun level firepower and relatively long range.

ThingDef.label: experimental Magnetic rifle
ThingDef.description: An experimental rifle，Magnetic track is added to improve range, and white phosphorus smoke grenade can be launched.

ThingDef.label: experimental carbine
ThingDef.description: An experimental carbine with a very special ammunition feeding mechanism, greatly reducing the length of the whole gun.Using HP bullets has good effects on biological targets, but poor effects on heavy targets

ThingDef.label: experimental carbine（API）
ThingDef.description: An experimental carbine with a very special ammunition feeding mechanism, greatly reducing the length of the whole gun.It use of armor piercing incendiary bullets is very effective against biological targets

ThingDef.label: experimental Magnetic carbine
ThingDef.description: An experimental carbine with a very special ammunition feeding mechanism, greatly reducing the length of the whole gun.Magnetic track is added to improve range, and white phosphorus smoke grenade can be launched.

HediffDef.label: White phosphorus adhesion
HediffDef.description: White phosphorus adheres to the body, and the flame will ignite repeatedly
